channel.title: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I saw Mapu's post trying to give some a server idea and it seemed successful, so i'm going to do the same. I'm looking for a coder who may want to update my server.
- the server will hopefully be f2p. - its like the old runescape before the wilderness (and this has already been coded). - i'm going to edit the XMLS etc and restrict the map.
I can do most of the work as its just editing XMLS.. i may need some one to improve the server efficiency and stuff. If anyone is interested i'l hopefully have a beta version up sometime this weekend for you to try it.. before accepting.
my email address is: salrathor1@hotmail.com.
Take Care.

item.title: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“total annihilation, post:1, topic:277696”][quote author=mapu link=topic=366505.msg2778597#msg2778597 date=1241653456]

Mapu, i’m really interested to see yours too considering epicPK is using your map system and stuff… although me and you had a few differences when we came to brainstorming ideas over there, so i’m guessing we will end up with different servers too

We can basically say my server is going to be like RSCA, except RSC before the wilderness with very few other changes aimed at making pking more fun… and obviously not as well maintained due to my lack of skills

good luck to you though… i would prefer someone else to make a fun server for me to play… Rather than me having to try and maintain a server with my lack of expertise! but my server is going to be quite different because its going to be about trying to get pixels as well as pking to add that old school spark… (without going into too much detail :P)

What I’m trying to hint to you is don’t waste your time making a server. It will be ddos’d and put down the day it goes up. Even if you being in-experienced isn’t enough reason not to put a server up, ddos will happen to you.

If you have some patience then you will see this new server idea come into fruition, although the server idea is not 99% original, it is however a completely new dynamic.

It’s a pk server but will draw everybody in. Skilling will be possible, and a major part of the economy. No other pk server has managed that quiet as good as this will.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2009, 05:46:16 pm[/size][hr]ps. Although this is my server and drive etc. I will not be running this server. I will merely over see it and make sure all goes well and sufficient changes/add-ons are put in place to make it all fit together properly.
[/quote]

Stop being so boastful and tell us more![/quote]sdfu

Read full topic
item.source: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth

item.title: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Suleman, post:13, topic:277617”]Mapu, i’m really interested to see yours too considering epicPK is using your map system and stuff… although me and you had a few differences when we came to brainstorming ideas over there, so i’m guessing we will end up with different servers too

We can basically say my server is going to be like RSCA, except RSC before the wilderness with very few other changes aimed at making pking more fun… and obviously not as well maintained due to my lack of skills

good luck to you though… i would prefer someone else to make a fun server for me to play… Rather than me having to try and maintain a server with my lack of expertise! but my server is going to be quite different because its going to be about trying to get pixels as well as pking to add that old school spark… (without going into too much detail :P)[/quote]

What I’m trying to hint to you is don’t waste your time making a server. It will be ddos’d and put down the day it goes up. Even if you being in-experienced isn’t enough reason not to put a server up, ddos will happen to you.

If you have some patience then you will see this new server idea come into fruition, although the server idea is not 99% original, it is however a completely new dynamic.

It’s a pk server but will draw everybody in. Skilling will be possible, and a major part of the economy. No other pk server has managed that quiet as good as this will.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2009, 05:46:16 pm[/size][hr]ps. Although this is my server and drive etc. I will not be running this server. I will merely over see it and make sure all goes well and sufficient changes/add-ons are put in place to make it all fit together properly.

item.title: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

I have something similar, although far superior and original.

If I were you I wouldn’t bother investing your time into it, but if you have a week to wait you’ll definately interested in playing mine. The major issue would be once you put it up, it will go down as soon as certain people hear about it.

protip: just wait for my one.

Read full topic
item.source: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth

item.title: Topic: Server idea for somebody worth
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“Suleman, post:9, topic:277617”]Hey,

maybe mine will fail too but i’m still going for oldschool RSC before the wilderness due to the fact that most people who played it prefered it to the wilderness. The only server that i’ve seen do something kind of like my idea is epicPK and i kind of asked for it there too… but mine is quite different because epic will have city clans and stuff if its developed how the community there were planning.

Anyways, i’l keep you guys posted… and beta will only be for a select few if anyones interested in seeing how RSC used to be

Take Care.
Sal[/quote]gl man, ill beta test!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Suleman Suleman
item.description:
@Suleman wrote:

Hey,

maybe mine will fail too but i’m still going for oldschool RSC before the wilderness due to the fact that most people who played it prefered it to the wilderness. The only server that i’ve seen do something kind of like my idea is epicPK and i kind of asked for it there too… but mine is quite different because epic will have city clans and stuff if its developed how the community there were planning.

Anyways, i’l keep you guys posted… and beta will only be for a select few if anyones interested in seeing how RSC used to be

Take Care.
Sal

item.dc:creator: @Suleman Suleman
item.description:
@Suleman wrote:

hmm, I don’t want to edit the old landscape too much. I just wanted to work towards an old RSC for those who played the RSC before the wilderness was implemented.

I don’t think the map is too big but I guess time will tell.
